content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 Dec 2018What do people mean when they say “Rally”?Is that an investment term?2 answersAnswerBump0

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 27 Dec 2018It's also a period of rallying growth or when demand starts to build in an economic  situation and market.0 comments0
Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 27 Dec 2018Rally when used in the context of equities refers to a period of growth/increase in price. It can occur in both bull and bear markets.0 comments0
